disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your Magento store
disconnected.subtitle: Enter the following data from your Magento store to connect it with Doppler. Therefore, you can automatically synchronize your contacts and also add the products of your store into your Emails using the Template Editor. Do you have any doubts? Press
disconnected.store_placeholder: Put the URL of your Magento store
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with your Magento store please try again later.

connected.title: Synchronize data entities with Subscriber Lists
connected.subtitle_list_count: You currently have {{availableLists}} Lists. Be aware that you can sync Lists manually whenever you want.
connected.subtitle: Select the Magento entity and the Doppler List you wish to synchronize. Contacts belonging to that entity will be automatically imported into the List.
connected.selected_list_subtitle: At this moment you have 1 List. Keep in mind that you can manually synchronize it any time you want.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: If you disconnect, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your Magento account and the Automations associated with the integration will be paused. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Link the fields of your entity with those of the Subscriber List.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.

status.title: Your Magento store is already connected to Doppler
status.subtitle: Your Contacts were integrated automatically from your store by the Doppler extension for Magento. You can also import your products into Email Templates and create Abandoned Cart and Product Retargeting Automations. Any doubts? Press
